def_en: The phrasing of something that is said or written is the exact words that are chosen to express the ideas in it.

def_cn: （演唱、演奏、表演等的）分句处理法
def_en: The phrasing of someone who is singing, playing a piece of music, acting, or reading something aloud is the way in which they divide up the work by pausing slightly in appropriate places.
